Class TranscriptInfoFactory

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    This is the builder for the TranscriptInfos from GFF files.
    Author:
    Marten Jaeger , Manuel Holtgrewe

      • buildTranscripts

        public ArrayList<TranscriptModelBuilder> buildTranscripts(HashMap<String,de.charite.compbio.jannovar.impl.parse.gff.FeatureProcessor.Gene> genes,
                                                 boolean useOnlyCurated)
                                                   throws InvalidAttributeException
        Process the genes and convert into an ArrayList of TranscriptInfoBuilders.
        Parameters:
        genes - the name/Gene map to build the TranscriptInfo objects for.
        useOnlyCurated - whether or not to only return curated transcripts
        Returns:
        list of TranscriptInfoBuilder objects
        Throws:
        InvalidAttributeException - on problems with invalid attributes
